summary:
Radiology supervisor reported that a CD with MRI information was supposed to be mailed to a Veteran. The Veteran reported that the CD with MRI report was not 
receivedA check of the radiology log revealed that the CD was mailed to the Hershey Medical Center instead of the Veteran. Radiology supervisor contacted the 
Hershey Medical Center and was informed that they did not receive the CD for this Veteran. The employee who mailed this information is on leave and will return 
next week. The CD included the Veterans full name, full SSN, and MRI report including medical information.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
